short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A charming gnome game made by Nikita Lurye, Maxime Tschopp, Manzoh Gellner, Vincent Herlinghaus, and Wesley Przybylowicz

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collect gnomes, build and manage a base in our Gnome Haven! Lure in new Gnomes with Flowers and trap them in holes to keep them. Use the coins they drop to buy and build expansions to your base! As you level up, new structures and expansions let you improve your Gnome-pire!

-- UPDATE 1.1 --
New battles and conquests added! Defend your base and attack enemies whilst doing the king's wishes.
